ygData.subject: RE: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Great Answers!  Thank you for posting.  I love to hear from you and from everyone.  You may be one of the youngest but I think that _all_ bards need to be
ygData.messageBody:
Great Answers! Thank you for posting. I love to hear from you and from
everyone. You may be one of the youngest but I think that _all_ bards need
to be young-at-heart!!

Please post again and tell us about your adventures and feel free to ask for
tips when you get a new song. If you play on the Innoruuk server, please
send me a /tell I would love to hunt with you some time!

Your friend,

Sylly Songsynger
The Bard!


-----Original Message-----
From: Janko S. [mailto:janko@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 12:14 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Time for another Sylly Survey

From: "Janko S." <janko@...>



When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: At weekends

Time of day: from midnight to 6.00am

Longest stretch of continuous play: 6 hours

Way to have game sounds: As silent as possible (I'm
probably one of the
youngest players here , if I wake up my mum I have to stop
playing :( )

Distance to sit from display: Arm lenght

TV show to have on: No TV

Music to listen to: gothic metall

Beverage (non-alcoholic): milk

Beverage (alcoholic): none

Health Food: none (saving money for my phone bil :) )

Junk Food: donuts

Clothes to wear: jeans and T-shirt
